sentences.en: A teenager reminds you of what you want to forger about your own part.
sentences.cn: 在青少年的身上,你看到你想忘记昔日自己的某些行为.

sentences.en: Cobb assembles a team, including a forger, a chemist expert in anesthesiology, and Ariadne (Ellen Page), a brilliant architecture student who can design dreamscapes in which Cobb can work.
sentences.cn: 科布成立了一个团队，包括一个伪造者，一名麻醉学的内行药剂师，和阿拉阿德涅（艾伦·佩奇），一个可以创造出科布工作的幻境的天才建筑学生。

sentences.en: He later got a call from the CIA, which was looking for a forger. Barron believes the judge recommended him.
sentences.cn: 后来，中央情报局要找造假者就给他打了电话，Barron相信是那位法官推荐了他。

sentences.en: Kelley was a notorious forger, mystic and alchemist who was familiar with Cardan grilles.
sentences.cn: 凯利是个恶名昭彰的伪造者 、 秘主义者和炼金术士,相当熟悉卡丹格板.

sentences.en: Okay he is actually a convicted forger and embezzler but does that mean his books are worthless?
sentences.cn: 他是实际上一个信服的伪造者和迷惘者,但是这意味着他的书毫无价值吗？

sentences.en: The forger swindled the merchants of the city out of large sums of money.
sentences.cn: 冒名者从该城的商人那里骗取了大笔金钱.

sentences.en: The forger swindled the merchants of this city out of large sums of money.
sentences.cn: 那个伪造者骗走了这个城市商人们的一大笔钱.

words.tran_cn: 伪造（forge的过去式）；锻造（金属）

trans.tran_en: someone who illegally copies documents, money, paintings etc and tries to make people think they are real
